permissions.users:create: Allow creating new users accounts with temporary passwords.
permissions.users:read: Allow reading users filtering by specific criteria or unique identifiers.
permissions.users:update: Allow updating user accounts adding or removing roles, activating or deactivating the account.
permissions.roles:create: Allow creating new roles with specific permissions.
permissions.roles:read: Allow reading roles and their associated permissions, filtering by specific criteria.
permissions.roles:update: Allow updating existing roles to modify their permissions, name or description.
permissions.roles:delete: Allow deleting roles from the system.
permissions.permissions:create: Allow creating new permissions to be assigned to roles.
permissions.permissions:read: Allow reading permissions filtering by specific criteria or unique identifiers.
permissions.permissions:update: Allow updating existing permissions to modify their attributes.
permissions.permissions:delete: Allow deleting permissions from the system.
permissions.clients:read: Allow reading client applications filtering by specific criteria or unique identifiers.
permissions.clients:update: Allow updating existing client applications to modify their access scopes or other attributes.
permissions.clients:delete: Allow deleting client applications from the system.
